{"id":1042360197,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1694022946,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1042360197/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"6.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int longest = longestCommonSubsequence(word1, word2);\n        return (word1.size() - longest + word2.size() - longest);\n    }\nprivate:\n    int longestCommonSubsequence(string& text1, string& text2) {\n        int n=text1.size(), m=text2.size();\n        vector<int> prev(m+1, 0), curr(m+1);\n\n        for(int i=1; i<=n; i++){\n            for(int j=1; j<=m; j++){\n                if(text1[i-1]==text2[j-1]){\n                    curr[j] = 1 + prev[j-1];\n                }\n                else{\n                    curr[j] = max(prev[j],curr[j-1]);\n                }        \n            }\n            prev=curr;\n        }\n\n        return prev[m];\n    }\n\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
